item.title: Fall in love with these gorgeous 8-bit GIFs of Japan
item.description:
Fall in love with these gorgeous 8-bit GIFs of Japan

Japan is a country caught between two worlds, blending together its feudal architecture and traditional ways with the fast-paced technology that is so core to its modern identity. Somehow, the series of GIFs developed by Tumblr user 1041uuu captures the beauty and dichotomy of Japanese everyday life.
